inscription:
Signature, Inscription, Edition and Stamp

LLC, in pencil: [3]; on back, in pencil: [90817]
life_date: Auguste Louis Lepère, French, Paris 1849–Domme, Dordogne 1918
provenance: [Catherine E. Burns, Oakland, CA, until 2001; sold in December for KTO, to Harry Drake]; Harry Drake, St. Paul (2001-d. 2012; bequeathed to MIA)
signed: LRC, in pencil: [A Lepère no 11 / tir 30 Ep]
title: Dockman, Pier at La Gare
